lead_paragraph: McLaren Applied Technologies has been chosen to supply batteries to the Formula E electric car racing series in the 2018-19 and 2019-20 seasons, the governing International Automobile Federation (FIA) said on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: McLaren Secure Formula E Battery Contract
headline.main: McLaren Secure Formula E Battery Contract
